sentences.english: Congratulations to you both and may the years ahead bring you continued joy and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 向你俩祝贺，愿时间白叟赐赉你们长久的幸福和满意。

sentences.english: In unexpected largesse? am I cold.
sentences.chinese: 我会冷漠于意外的赏赉？

sentences.english: The company rewarded me a new department suite for my outstanding achievements.
sentences.chinese: 由于我工作成绩突出，公司赏赉给我一套新房。

sentences.english: Shaphat son of Adlai was in charge of the herds in the valleys.
sentences.chinese: 掌管山谷牧养牛群的是亚第赉的儿子沙法。

sentences.english: We call this God's Amazing Pharmacy…
sentences.chinese: 于是，我们称之为天主赐赉的最神奇药物。
